title: Canvas

messages.gptImagePermissionRequired: You must enable gpt-image-1 model permissions to use this feature!

deleteDialog.title: Delete Canvas
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this Canvas? This action cannot be undone.

instagram.caption: Caption
instagram.hashtagsHint: Hashtags will be automatically prefixed with #
instagram.connectDescription: Connect your Instagram account to upload images directly from the canvas.
instagram.privacyNote: Your Instagram credentials are securely stored and only used to upload images you choose to share.

exploreDescription: Discover Instagram ads and use them as references for your own creations
exploreConnectDescription: Connect your Instagram account to view and use your posts as references
noMediaDescription: You don't have any Instagram posts yet
selectAFolderDescription: Select a folder to view its images and videos
noMediaFilesDescription: No images or videos in this folder
brandAnalysisDescription: Enter and save your brand information to use for ad creation
targetAudiencePlaceholder: Describe your target audience (e.g., Women aged 20-30, IT professionals, etc.)
brandValuesPlaceholder: Enter your brand's core values (e.g., Innovation, Eco-friendly, High Quality)
brandChatSubtitle: Tell us about your brand and we'll automatically organize the information
brandChatWelcome: Hello! Please tell me about your brand and I'll automatically organize the information for you. Feel free to share your brand name, description, industry, target audience, brand colors, values, etc.
brandChatExtracted: I've extracted the brand information. Please check the form on the right. If you have additional information, please continue!
brandChatContinue: Got it. If you provide more detailed information, I can organize it more accurately.
brandChatError: Sorry, an error occurred while extracting information. Please try again.
